section: The business name of the Venture will be BM&V2GO, however the partnership name will be Vaccines2Go.
explanation: This section introduces a contradiction by stating two different names for the same entity (the Venture). The first part states the business name will be "BM&V2GO," while the second part indicates the partnership name will be "Vaccines2Go." This creates confusion regarding the official and legal name of the venture, making it unclear which name should be used in legal documents, contracts, and other official contexts. This lack of clarity can lead to legal and operational issues.

section: Duties of Members may be amended, from time to time, by decision of the Members, provided that the Members' interests are not affected except with the unanimous consent of the Members.
explanation: This statement presents an ambiguity. The phrase 'Duties of Members may be amended, from time to time, by decision of the Members' is vague regarding the level of consensus needed to proceed with amending member's duties. The second part 'provided that the Members' interests are not affected except with the unanimous consent of the Members' adds a caveat to the first part. It could be interpreted to mean that a simple majority is sufficient to amend member duties, unless those amendments affect member interests, in which case unanimous consent is required. This ambiguity can lead to disputes among members regarding the validity and enforceability of amended duties.

section:
Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"):
Member Contribution Description Agreed Value
BorrowMoney.com, inc 1, 500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty* $3,500.00 USD
JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: There is a significant discrepancy in the stated value of the contribution made by JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go. The description states that the company is contributing '$60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions', yet the 'Agreed Value' column lists the value as '$3,500,000.00 USD'. This large difference in value creates ambiguity and raises questions about the actual capital contribution of JVLS, LLC, as well as the method of valuation used. This could lead to disputes regarding ownership percentages, profit distribution, and liability.
